Description: We are seeking an experienced, enthusiastic, and outcome-focused Intern for Community Engagement and Event Management to become part of our team at Sliceinn, a dynamic hospitality and real estate brand located in Bangalore.SliceInn is all about your own designer room, your own workspace for the daily grind, a warm and fluffy bed, and the opportunity to forge new friendships through shared meals and swap stories every day, easy access to in-house entertainment activities for the weekends, and ultimately, an outstanding experience.In this role, as a Community Engagement and Event Management Intern, you will have a pivotal role in defining our brand's image, actively engaging with our online community, elevating resident participation, and nurturing a vibrant community atmosphere. Your innovative concepts and strategic insights will significantly contribute to the development and triumph of the new Sliceinn community.Job Details
